name: Minoils Media Ltd
goal: Minoils Media Ltd, through Natural Gas World provides news, analysis and insight into natural gas matters from around the world and seeks to be a facilitator for the meaningful engagement needed between the key stakeholder segments: industry, policy-makers, academia, NGOs, and the public.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Single market
euInitiatives: As part of our coverage of news regarding the Energy Union our representatives follow different activities and events with the aim of providing insight and information to our readers of what is happening regarding European policy developments.
